key_title: Key to the varieties of Helichrysum adenophorum

source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Asteraceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Jeanes, J.A. (1999). Asteraceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaf undersides glandular-hairy; leaf-bases broad and stem-clasping; western Victoria and Wilsons Promontory
Leaf undersides white-woolly; leaf-bases narrow, not stem-clasping; alpine and subalpine
